description:
Creating an `API
Ecosystem <https://teamdigitale.governo.it/en/projects/api.htm>`__ is
one of the goal of the `Italian Government Digital Transformation
Team <https://teamdigitale.governo.it/en/>`__.

This talk shows how OpenAPI (formerly known as Swagger) is a cornerstone
for standardizing the behavior of the APIs created by thousands of
Public Administrations.

After a brief introduction to OpenAPI, we’ll show the current work on
documenting service management semantics (eg. circuit breaker) and
standardizing API elements and schemas.

Code samples are based on
```connexion`` <https://connexion.readthedocs.io/en/latest/quickstart.html#running-%20it>`__:
a python framework based on flask which makes trivial creating REST APIs
and sandboxes useful for testing and interoperability.

**Feedback form:** https://python.it/feedback-1681

in \_\_on **Sunday 5 May** at 10:15 `**See
schedule** </en/sprints/schedule/pycon10/>`__
title: Using OpenAPI (and Python) to standardize a Country's API Ecosystem
